channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amanda Serrano Vs. Reina Tellez: What Time Does The Fight Start?
item.description: Amanda Serrano vs. Reina Tellez starts at 8 p.m. ET on DAZN Saturday with ring walks around 11 p.m. ET. Here's the full card and how to watch.

item.title: World Rallycross Went Back To Combustion: Is Electric Racing Failing?

item.title: 2026 Kicks Off With A Wolf Moon That Will Peak On January 3rd - Here Is Where To Watch

item.title: See Northern Lights, ‘Shooting Stars’ And A Full Moon This Weekend
item.description: A NOAA forecast suggest that Northern Lights may be visible in northern U.S. states this weekend as solar wind conditions intensify.
